site_name: M&S White City Site54 Wood LaneLondonW12 7RQ
description: Non-material amendment to vary Condition 1 of planning permission ref. 2023/02105/RES granted on 24 September 2024 for: Reserved Matters Application relating to the approval of access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale in respect of Phase 4 (comprising Development Plots D1, D2 and D3 (Buildings 7, 8 and 9)) for the erection of 3no. 18-28 storey buildings with basement level providing 503 residential units, commercial floorspace with associated external amenity space, public realm, car and cycle parking and other works pursuant to planning permission 2023/01965/VAR dated 21 August 2024 (for the comprehensive residential led mixed use redevelopment of the former M&S Warehouse in White City). The amendments relate to changes to the fa√ßade drawings of Building D1 of Phase 4 to demonstrate the proposed change in materials and colour pallet.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
